website_summaries.verdict: These high-quality protein, large sized bars come in a wide variety of flavors, but are a bit pricey.
pros: All-natural ingredients and no added sugar
Boasts exceptional protein from whey and milk
cons: Some testers noted that these bars have a new recipe that uses corn fiber, which is not as good as the old formula

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these get so many good reviews they are absolutely awful! They are hard and are like one consistency which is not what I was picturing. I tried every single flavor and they all made me want to throw the bar across the room. I would rather not eat than eat these. Maybe I am being harsh but I read all these great reviews and was exciting because the sugar and carbs are low. There is a reason for this! Cause they taste like chewy cardboard!! Having flashbacks now just writing this. Bleck!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bost

customer_reviews.title: Delicious High-Protein, High-Fiber Snack
customer_reviews.text: What isn't there to love about Quest bars? I like them, generally eat one daily, as a high-protein, high-fiber snack. I have a subscription for Quest Bars that is sent monthly, but they are so popular at my house that everyone helps themselves and they are gobbled up fast. I bought this sampler set to taste other flavors. My favorites are Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough (chewy deliciousness), S'mores (campfire memories), Cookies and Cream (pass the milk, please), and White Chocolate Raspberry (nice clean taste on the palate). My least favorite thing about these bars? How fast they disappear! They are yummy...!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: The best nutritional bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered Quest bars at a local store. I fell in love with the taste and quality of Quest bars. I craved more flavors to try, so searched Amazon and found this variety pack. I couldn't be more pleased to find a high protein, low carb, nearly no sugar, and only $2 per bar. I eat one on my commute home from work. Sometimes I have one as a mid afternoon snack. They are easy to throw in a bag and take anywhere. I will be bringing them along on vacation to have a healthy option while sitting in airports or on the plane. Yummy flavors, great nutrition, and no guilt. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb bars... great feeling slimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Low carbohydrate weight loss is what works best for my blood type and metabolism. I’ve gained 20 lbs. from not over eating or eating too much. I just can’t eat sugar, starch or salty foods. I also stopped drinking diet cokes and have been drinking Propel. Ive been on bed rest for over a month and I lost a dress size doing nothing but changing mainly the protein bars and water. I ate chicken and hamburger patties with cheese as well. Leto stick was purple in 2 weeks which proved I was burning fat. Can’t wait to add exercises to help speed off the rest. It’s a way of life diet. You must know how it works to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I can't finish a whole bar
customer_reviews.text: I've really tried to like these bars but they are hard to eat. Something about the flavor is too strong for me that I can't finish a whole bar. The taste and texture is off. Every bite is a chore and I can't recommend these bars. I'm now stuck with a large amount of bars that I won't eat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is trying to lose weight, I find these bars to be very helpful. Sugar free and moderately high in protein, they are pretty delicious and satisfying. They are not necessarily "filling", but they do take hunger away, which lasts for a few hours for me. Within 10 minutes they level my glucose levels while satisfying cravings for sweets (chocolate). Some of the flavors are 1 WW point than the others, (5 vs. 4) but they are worth it. This is my second order, and I have not had any freshness/ mold incidents as I have seen a couple of others report. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Sucralose, put the ingredients in the listing.
customer_reviews.text: I should have done more research. It is really sad that the listing doesn't mention Sucralose. It is on the labels. Forget these and just eat something with better ingredients. I don't even really care for the taste of sugar, and I sure don't need artificial sweeteners in my food. For the cost and the lofty claims about kitchens and rolling pins there is some weird stuff in these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Day

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but Squished
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these bars! They have higher protein, and fewer calories than my regular Adkins cookie dough bars. I was introduced to them after trying a birthday cake flavored one, which is still my favorite. They taste like a protein bar, so if you actually expect maple waffles in the package instead of a flavored replacement version, you’re in the wrong place. But if you’re used to protein bars and their after-tastes than I think you’ll enjoy them. I gave 4/5 because they arrived totally smashed. Luckily they’re soft bars, so it wasn’t messy, but every bar looked like they had been sat on.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney D.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, filling, low carb and lots of fiber!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to figure out which bars you like and don’t like without spending a ton of money and time. Overall all the bars were good, doesn’t have the chalky protein taste like most bars. My favorite flavors? Cookies and cream, blueberry mufffin, s’mores, strawberry cheesecake so far. I did not care for the double chocolate, cookie dough and a few others. Worth buying for sure to make this a new daily part of your diet. There are a few that’s not in here to such as birthday cake! For the fiber, low carbs and great taste, it’s a well made filling bar. I even ate the non preferred flavors but won’t buy them again either!
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Decent flavor, a little small.
customer_reviews.text: These bars aren't very thick and don't fill me up like the cookies and cream meal bars do. They're good for a snack, though. They don't seem to have as much alcohol sugars as the cookies and cream meal bars, and don't swell me up with gas as much. The flavor is a little artificial on some of the flavors, but they're fine for a diet. I've eaten worse, that's for sure. I like the high fiber in them. Usually when I go on a low carb diet, I end up constipated, but things moved along just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected.
customer_reviews.text: So I've only tried the Maple one but it was as good as one can expect from a low carb item. Honestly it was worth the money. I'll update my review once I've tried more of them. I wanted to come on here and post my pictures of how I received my package because it looked great and everything was in great condition. The pictures posted on here only show poor examples. I'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The smell is only slightly less awful than the taste
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I have a whole box of these and so far every one I've tried has ended up in the trash. They smell like medicine and have absolutely no flavor that corresponds to the name of the bar. It's hard enough to be on a bariatric diet and having to try to get some taste satisfaction from these bars is a sad contribution to the program.
customer_reviews.author: Catden

customer_reviews.title: TOTALLY NASTY
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to try for the first time. I got the variety pack. I hate every single flavor. You can literally see the protein gobs in the bar. It's incredibly hard to chew and very dry. The after taste kills you. Now, when you look at it and the packaging, it looks very pretty and it has 20g of carbs. If you can stomach the flavor, then this is perfect for your protein intake and they keep you full. I have to chew gum or drink a very sweet-tasting pre-workout to get the taste out of my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Beef

customer_reviews.title: Great for Weight Loss, Terrible for Jaws
customer_reviews.text: Unless you can nuke it in the microwave for 5 seconds, I wouldn't recommend these simply because they are so hard to chew. I have seriously developed a click in my jaw from years of chewing this space manufactured product. The flavors are good but after a while it all starts to taste the same, but the pretty pictures of Cinnabons or Brownies sort of trick your brain into thinking it really is eating dessert. Great nutritional numbers, not sure if the ingredients are altogether great for you since there's about a hundred listed.
customer_reviews.author: Clelia

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like a lot of the flavors
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like a lot of the flavors, but was glad I got the variety pack to be able to try all of the flavors. Some of the bars had only 4 months until expiration. This may be ok if you eat them quickly, but I wanted them for an occasional snack and had also purchased some other bars. I ended up eating them much more quickly than I had wanted due to the short expiration date. I’m glad that I was able to find which flavors I liked best.
customer_reviews.author: chi2chi

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I got both the adventure pack and the chocolate lovers pack, and they are both amazing!!!! Overall only two bars I really didn’t care for were the chocolate peanut butter and the coconut cashew.... but even those weren’t terrible, just not as great as some of the others. Plenty of them really taste like you are cheating on a diet with them bc they are so good!! Overall I think the chocolate pack bars are a little tastier, but i like all the varieties in thw adventure pack..: so I’ll probably keep ordering them together. I also read reviews saying they were expired, and mine absolutely were not.
customer_reviews.author: kmunoz01

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavors
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have finally found a pack that contains my 3 favorite flavors, but once I opened the package chocolate peanut butter and double chocolate chunk were also included. The product description specifically said that I would be receiving 4 cookies and cream 4 chocolate chip cookie dough, and 4 chocolate brownie. Now I'm stuck with 4 bars that are just going to the garbage since they are my least favorite. Next time I can just go to GNC and pick them out on my own to make sure I get the flavors I want.
customer_reviews.author: Jnt_5

customer_reviews.title: Not pleasing to eat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large combo pack. Each "flavor" is basically the same, a large bar of difficult to chew base with different flavorings and added little bits, such as "chocolate" chips. I have not found one that was tasty enough to buy it again and after two weeks I still have more than half the carton. I have found other protein bars that are much tastier and have real variety in taste and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bars, just not the flavors I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Loving most of the flavors I have tried. However, I got 2 flavors that we're not on the list that I was expecting. I received a cookies and cream and a vanilla almond crunch instead of the coconut cashew and apple pie. I would have liked to try both that I didn't get, but at least I haven't had the vanilla almond so I can try that. If you want to try some flavors, the adventure pack is great. Just don't count on them matching the list in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Nevermind

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't taste that great
customer_reviews.text: I am on Weight Watchers and needed something that tastes sweet for those times that you just need a quick fix. These will do the trick but they don't taste all that great. The one good thing is you won't be tempted to over do it. The One Protein bars tastes much better than these but they have more points and more calories and you do want to go get another on so I guess I'll stick with these for now.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ok I guess
customer_reviews.text: These are not ok. I will eat them when I don’t have time to make a meal certainly better than the protein chips I am new to the world of low carb. My doctor suggested that I lower carbs, sugar and cholesterol but try not to lose weight. I am wondering if this is even possible because everything in the snack world tastes mildly unpleasant to downright terrible.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Quest bars are a ketonians best friend. Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Quest bars are a ketonians best friend. Great taste, variety of flavors, low carb, and very filling. This particular adventure pack was full of flavors I didn't even know existed so of course I'm eating those flavors first lol 🤣 I want to eat them all NOW! This package is in line with unit pricing per bar in a grocery store, I'm ok with that since it's a variety pack. If it was a case of all one flavor I'd expect a slightly better price. I'll def buy this pack again! 👍😉
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Nichols

customer_reviews.title: love variety
customer_reviews.text: I'd say over half of these are great and less than half I didn't care for. It's nice to try the varies flavors because now I know which ones I love. They are not cost friendly so I would hate to buy a whole box of the ones I didn't care for. I would recommend trying the variety before sticking with the one you love.
customer_reviews.author: destiny

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Typical Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are higher protein and lower net carbs, but I'm looking for something that has a different, less processed texture and taste than the standard protein bar. The Quest Hero bars seem to meet that standard. They at least have a little crisp to them instead of the mealy processed texture. Overall, pretty typical, but with lower carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mc

customer_reviews.title: Not a Candy Bar
customer_reviews.text: These bars are packed with protein and fiber, and are low in sugar and fat. While I prefer the fruit flavors, the cookie dough is another favorite. A few seconds in the microwave can enhance some of the flavors. I love this variety box, so I can have a different flavor every day. If you’re looking for protein meal bars, you should definitely try these.
customer_reviews.author: mcg

customer_reviews.title: Dry, grainy and gross
customer_reviews.text: I was trying something new because I have been eating Adkins bars for ever. These bars not only look gross they taste gross also. They are dense, dry and grainy. I will just grin and bear it as I purchases 2 boxes by mistake. Luckily I still have my other bars so I can switch off every day or so.
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars ever
customer_reviews.text: Found my new favorite protein bars. The picture on the packaging is deceiving, the bar looks nothing like the picture, but it absolutely taste like what the picture is showing. Haven’t come across a flavor that I don’t like (I’m very picky about flavors). Definitely recommend and will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing taste
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give it zero stars or I would. I LOVE Quest protein powder. So, I finally got my $30 to try the bars. What a disappointment... they are heavy, chewy (not in a good way) and reek chemical taste. TRY BEFORE YOU BUY. I should have. I am glad they have 20g of protein... but man, I will struggle through each of those grams.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela C. Stefanescu

customer_reviews.title: Loved the variety pack!
customer_reviews.text: These bars were recommended by a friend. I wanted to be able to try different flavors before purchasing whole boxes. There were certain flavors I loved, while others weren't the greatest (coconut). But that was only because of my own pickiness! Now I know which flavors to buy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste and texture of bars was different.
customer_reviews.text: It came perfect in packet. I am a big fan of quest bars, there are like a treat after workout with high protein. Mostly when I buy it directly from store they are soft to bite and chew but the one came from here were bit hard to chew and had a weird after taste especially the chocolate brownie one. I am not sure if I would order again online since it changes the quality of bars.
customer_reviews.author: __ma

customer_reviews.title: Good bar great taste
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product as a snack. Great flavor. Love them. They are sweetened with Stevia.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to beat Quest bars for a low-carb, high-protein bar. However, their QA leaves something to be desired. Several boxes have had bars that are rock hard despite being within their expiration date. I reached out to their support team last week but haven't heard back. If they fix it I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Quest Bars Make Great Meals
customer_reviews.text: Quest bars come in handy for last minute snacks and/or meals on days your hungry yet don't know what to eat. The Quest bars come in a variety of flavors which can make tasting the bars quite interesting. So far my family's favorite are the cookie dough and oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great bars, but terrible gas
customer_reviews.text: I like most of the flavors in this variety pack. However, after some trial and error, I realized that these give me atrocious gas that lasts almost 24 hours. I can't justify eating these when my own farts offend me this much. I'm a veteran farter and the results of these bars is still unacceptable. D:
customer_reviews.author: Megan McEvers

customer_reviews.title: Thick, bitter, hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: The texture of these are just awful. The flavors are okay, but they really have that nasty protein after taste. I can only manage to get half of one down at a time because they are so hard to chew. If you don't wrap them up, they turn rock hard.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: It's like eating cardboard
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what the other people who left glowing reviews normally eat, but for those of us who eat standard food types, this stuff is terrible! There is no real flavor and the bars are dry.....might be a meal replacement but they also replaced all the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: great variety for a great price. Always wanted to have like a sampler of the different protein bars Quest has and THIS IS IT. There are some good flavor ones out there like the cinnamon bun and then there are the not so good tasting ones. But knowing is half the battle.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Banda

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is an issue
customer_reviews.text: These are way more healthy than typical snacks on the mainstream market. The issue is that most of them taste abysmal. It makes you go out of your way to just knuckle down and make a more time-consuming snack to avoid these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: High protein, easy transport, decent flavor
customer_reviews.text: People are nuts, if it tastes absolutely delicious it probably isn’t that good for you. They taste fine, which is exactly what I’m looking for out of a PROTEIN bar. They are very high in protein and low in everything else. Texture is nice, not too chewy. I use these when carrying around a chicken breast is impractical and they serve their purpose very well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Max Williger

customer_reviews.title: Perspective
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of reviews about how these quest bars taste bad and are not worth it. However I personally think it is all about perspective. If you are looking for something that is sorta healthy and taste amazing then this is not for you. Go buy cliff bars instead. But if nutrition is your biggest priority then quest bars are definitely the right purchase. Considering the nutritional label they taste pretty good and come in all sorts of flavors. I eat them in-between meals and don’t have to worry about messing up my macros. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: They're Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after buying a Quest bar (birthday cake flavor) on a whim at the convenience store and really liking it. Unfortunately, these aren't up to par. I haven't been able to actually finish an entire bar and I've gone through half the pack. I won't be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: From many years of eating protein bars in different varieties I know not to expect the taste to be the greatest thing ever because if it tasted that good it wouldn't be high protein, low carb, it would be dessert. I really do like these and the taste exceeded my expectations for a protein bar with no artificial sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Twin mommy

customer_reviews.title: A good value for anyone on Keto
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while I was on Keto and used them as a dessert item. A few of the flavors weren't great, but only one (blueberry muffin) was in the "wow this tastes extremely diet." category. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb protein bar
customer_reviews.text: Can honestly say, Quest bars are delicious. I was pleasantly surprised to discover the bar the best fit my needs, also is one of the best tasting protein bars I have had. My expectations were surpassed and definitely consider these to bars to be my new go to. Will continue to keep a supply on hand. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of the variety pack i enjoyed. Oddly my second purchase i can hardly stand the Erythritol. Just too sweet for me. I eat a lot of products with artificial sugar, in my opinion Quest uses to much. I reccomend Quest protein chips! Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa w.

customer_reviews.title: Damn they are tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how these bar taste in comparison to other ones I have tried. The main reason I purchased was for the amount of protein and low carb and sugar values. The Adventure pack is the way to go, so many good options to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: redwolf3773

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe LOW CARB claim!
customer_reviews.text: The description shows “LOW CARB”. Are you kidding me? I ordered 2 boxes (variety pack & chocolate lovers) and found the minimum carbs are 21 up to 25. The Keto Diet allow 20 carbs per day max so these definitely are not low carb!
customer_reviews.author: Mike OBeirne

customer_reviews.title: So much better than other protein bars.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. They are chewy, moist enough. And satisfying. I have half for my morning snack then the other half for my afternoon snack. They also satisfy my sweet tooth. I love the variety pack. Every one is good. Can’t say I have a favorite. I did buy a box for my Diabetic son. He didn’t like them. So tastes vary. Give them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these bars. We are both on the Keto diet and he says that these are his dessert and keeps him in line at night. I personally don’t care for the texture or taste of all of these but I’m also not big into protein bars so don't listen to me!
customer_reviews.author: Traveling_Robinsons

customer_reviews.title: Product not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it showed 3 bars of 4 different varieties - NONE of which were peanut or peanut butter. You see, I AM ALLERGIC TO PEANUTS, no I did not want anything that had peanuts as a primary ingredient. Instead, I received 2 bars of 6 different varieties - 2 of which are peanut butter. I guess I will have to give those away and learn not to believe what I see. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh at all
customer_reviews.text: I know Quest bars, I have been eating them for years. But I've eaten 2 bars so far from this shipper and they're almost too hard to eat or bite through. Fresh Quest bars are soft. Disappointed. Will be purchasing from Quest directly next time.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Meehan

customer_reviews.title: so delicious, can't believe these are protein bars
customer_reviews.text: from my past experience, protein bars and other snacks always tasted bland and offered very little amount of protein for the calories. NOT THESE, these bars were absolutely delicious and tasted like other sugary candy bars.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: SORRY
customer_reviews.text: I HATE not being able to give this a good review but just not a good taste to me. I was hoping after reading some of the other not so good reviews that me NOT BEING A PICKY person thought I would like them.. Really bad after taste, the ONLY one that is somewhat OK is the chocolate chip.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Motorcycle Travel!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Quest bars. The adventure pack was a great way to sample some flavors we hadn’t tried before. Of course we love them all! We discovered what a great product Quest bars are when we traveled from Pennsylvania to Texas by motorcycle this summer. Quest bars gave us plenty of energy and nutrition without weighing us down. Saved us a lot of money too, since we didn’t need to eat in a restaurant for every meal. Now we eat them before or after workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Scheeren

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars are very good. The texture is a little strange at first, but have gotten used to it. Some of the flavors are great. My favorite so far is the apple pie flavor. Quest is a good product, and was glad to locate these on Amazon. Price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Hill

customer_reviews.title: Taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: I guess everyone has a different taste, but these are absolutely horrible. I understand protein/meal replacement bars aren't supposed to taste good, but I can't even stomach these things. Really wish there was a way to get my money back because there is no way I can eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bircher

customer_reviews.title: Great test batch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try out a bunch of flavor before committing to a dozen of one flavor, and this batch was great for that. Glad I did, because there were some unexpected hits (Maple waffle!). Wish it had Birthday Cake in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: A Unique Product
customer_reviews.text: While this product has a texture that is similar to many others on the market, Quest has done an amazing job at perfecting some unique flavors. Definitely an interesting supplement!
customer_reviews.author: mvcrez

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but some inconsistencies
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the variety and all of the flavors. I have noticed some inconsistencies in the product, sometimes they are soft and fresh and then the next order is firm and stale.
customer_reviews.author: MommyPerez

customer_reviews.title: Delicious collection!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Quest bars. I've never had a bad one, but I do like variety. I found this collection satisfied that desire perfectly. There were several flavors in this bundle that I had not seen at my usual stores. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Reimers

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The Quest Bars were exactly as promised and the shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: AnnetteD

customer_reviews.title: Gluten Free High Protein
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gluten free, low carb, high protein bar that tasted good. This bar fits the bill. Great on days I'm traveling or doing errands and want something to eat but don't want to eat fast food or spend time or money on eating out.
customer_reviews.author: Rosedaze

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome assortment and def. The best protien bars around for gastric bypass people to have. They aren't hella chewy and they taste great. BUT they are suuuper expensive. So that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy again. Threw out remainder.
customer_reviews.text: Would never buy again. Tasted like chalk with a side of taffy, very hard to eat. Most others recommended to warm in microwave prior to eating...BUT when using these as a post workout or a snack, that’s impossible as no one keeps a microwave in their vehicle. Would never buy again, threw out remaining ones I had because they were SO bad.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor and macros
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great for this type of product. Keeps you feeling full. They take a while to eat since they're so dense and chewy that that alone helps curb your appetite... in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Castine

customer_reviews.title: Great way to try all flavors
customer_reviews.text: Box was in good shape, all flavors were included. There were a few that tasted like straight up fake chemically food. My favorite is definitely birthday cake. Least favorite was that cashew one. Bleh.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love Quest bars as a clean
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Quest bars as a clean, high-protein, low-carb option for a quick bite or pre- or post-workout refuel. I like the variety pack so I can try different flavors and not get burned out eating through 12 of the same one. My only request would to be phasing out sucralose completely and sweetening only with Stevia -- seems to be the case in some but not all flavors. Thanks much for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Henry

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Quest bars and I'm disappointed that I didn't discover them sooner! So far, every one I've tried has been delicious! I initially bought the Adventure Variety pack and am already planning on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Tasted like sawdust that a hamster died in.
customer_reviews.text: I'd tried they Quest Hero bars, and liked them. Unfortunately, I didn't realize that these were not the same thing. These were simply god-awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, healthy and filling!
customer_reviews.text: My son, 15, is a work out and health nut and was begging for these bars. I was hesitant because they are a little pricey but I bought a box and he was so excited, he even put a note on them that said, "do not eat" because he didn't want to share! He said the cookies and cream are his favorite. I like that they are healthy and filling!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good low carb bars
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great for a low carb diet and most of the flavors are good. These have a great amount of protein and fiber without the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried Quest bars before so wanted the variety pack to pick which ones I like. Turns out I like them all so will just keep ordering this variety pack monthly!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Half of them are ok, only a few great flavors
customer_reviews.text: I only liked about half of the flavors. Some were too sweet— but that fake kind of icky sweet. It was a good introduction to quest bars and now I know my favorite is white chocolate raspberry but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy in my tummy!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so obsessed with these, I don’t even know what to say. They have ACTUAL blueberries in the blueberry one. Of course they’re not cheap, but better than paying retail!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarz

customer_reviews.title: They make me fart a lot😬
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Just not very satisfying still supper hungry after eating them and they give me the worst gas ever. I like to have protein bars if I’m in the go having a busy day. Who wants to be out and about while having the farts...
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, for a protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I've had Quest bars many times over the years, some are quite yummy for a protein bar, others (peanut butter cup) has a "chemical" taste. I just tried the oatmeal chocolate chip for the first time and it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: HillBilly Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it could be..add some more flavor!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor only seemed to appear when you got to a blueberry or raspberry etc. They need to distribute the flavors throughout the bar. I tried the "One" brand at the same time and it tasted better because I believe the flavors went all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Quest Bars. See photos attached
customer_reviews.text: Not Real Quest Bars! Attached are photos of the package the bars came in. Certainly not original Quest box/packaging. I am not touching these bars and want my money back to buy real Quest products.
customer_reviews.author: Rockn Nurse

customer_reviews.title: Not the best texture
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually eat protein bars so maybe that's why but these have awful texture but pretty great flavor if you can get passed it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: So good I almost don’t want you to know
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAVORITE pack! Huge variety and it helps me to decide which flavors will continue to be my top choices. But ultimately, they’re all so good, I typically can’t help but eat too many haha
customer_reviews.author: lauren willey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Keto
customer_reviews.text: These are the lowest carb bars I can find. The flavors are nice especially for the protein to carb ratio. I eat them frequently on my Keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Young

customer_reviews.title: They Do Their Job
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy these, ask yourself if you care more about taste or feeling full longer. It does the job of keeping you full. However the taste is okay once you get past the gritty feel & pure protein taste. It also has an aftertaste. This is a pretty good price for these considering these sold individually are expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Jisette Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great variety pack
customer_reviews.text: The variety in this pack is great! Great portable snack bar packed with protein and flavor. S’mores is especially good!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: great variety pack to try new flavors
customer_reviews.text: Delivery took a bit for prime shipping, but the product was delivered as described. Bars have a chewy protein bar texture but the flavors are as described.
customer_reviews.author: angirn

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ok these bars are amazing, so good and not chalky. I will definitely buy these again. They’re a little pricey but the flavor definitely outweighs the price
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: They taste like real food!
customer_reviews.text: These are all amazing! I can't pick a favorite, so I ordered another variety pack. And a chocolate variety pack too! The only thing missing is the birthday cake bar, which I want to try before buying a box of them. Other than that, you can't go wrong with any of these options.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Have to have Quest bars !
customer_reviews.text: I love Quest bars and the big cookie. I usually eat one bar for breakfast and sometimes in the middle of the night when I wake up and feel hungry. If I didn’t discipline myself I often wonder how many I would eat. Yours are really fresh and I always enjoy the variety box.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy4825

customer_reviews.title: Low sugar high protein
customer_reviews.text: I love quest bars! There is a bit of an artificial sweetener taste, but with the lack of sugar and amt of protein it's easily overlooked. Not eating a lot of meat I use quest as a source of protein. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal substitute
customer_reviews.text: Use these for lunch sometimes when I don't have a lot of time or don't want a regular meal. Keeps me full all afternoon. I've purchased before but as single flavor so this assortment let me try all of them without investing in entire boxes so I can pick my favorite flavors
customer_reviews.author: Ri Sgrig

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent taste
customer_reviews.text: Some of them have a chalky taste, but most are pretty good. They are nice to just throw in your bag and have when you're hungry.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: assortment
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see which ones I liked best so this was good for that, but didn't like most of them.
customer_reviews.author: EJax

customer_reviews.title: Love every flavor in this set
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great flavors, and great source of protein on the go. I only wish I lifted weights so that my body had more use for the nourishment.
customer_reviews.author: ButterWillDoIt

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.  I prefer one bars
customer_reviews.text: Some are ok to eat others not so much. Needed to cure a sweet tooth on this keto diet. I prefer the one bars. Much more delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Miller

customer_reviews.title: Chalky, yucky aftertaste!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying Quest bars. Yuck. Tried 3 different flavors. The aftertaste was consistently unbearable to me. Gave them away. So glad I used a gift card and not my own money. Low sugar/calorie content, but the taste is lacking big time for me. Happy eating to those who love 'em! Not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, I would order again
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal, especially for people on the keto diet. These bars are usually sold separately at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the flavor variety that is provided through Amazon. It is a far greater selection than you are provided in the traditional box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting low carb bars
customer_reviews.text: I love quest bars and have been using quest products for the past several years. I purchased this so I could try some of the flavors I hadn't tried yet. I am pleased with all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P

customer_reviews.title: To each it’s own
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like all the flavors but that’s due to my own taste buds good value tho if you can stomach some flavors
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Bars around
customer_reviews.text: Best protein meal replacement bars around. They fill you up without feeling you are putting garbage or a candy bar loaded with a vitamin pill in your body. Quest bars are good stuff with many great flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Traister

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Great taste and not overly sweet - at least for me. A great source of protein as well. Thanks for a super product.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover1

product_meta.title: Quest Nutrition Protein Bar America's Variety Pack. 20-21 Grams of Protein, Gluten-Free and no added Sugar. Meal Replacement Bar with High Fiber and Low Net Carbs. (12 COUNT)
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:America's VarietyQuest Nutrition's mission is to revolutionize food and make clean eating fun! Quest Bars were created from a simple idea: Food should taste as good as it is good for you. 

 QUEST NUTRITION
Founded in 2010, a small group of wellness enthusiasts gathered around a kitchen with a vision for a NEW kind of protein bar that they actually wanted to eat. They knew they weren’t the only ones in need of a product that doesn’t compromise. Others were looking for a way to cheat clean, and it wasn’t out there. So Quest decided to make it. Not just for them, but for everyone who wants to eat better and enjoy every bite. 

 ROLLING PINS AND HAND-HELD KNIVES
After several months huddled around Quest Creator Shannon Penna, slowly but surely Quest was able to learn what works and what doesn’t. Finally, they got to the point where the bars were delicious and nutritious enough to sell. Made with rolling pins and hand-held knives, Quest propelled forward by a clear goal to change lives. 

 FLAVORS FOR EVERYONE 
What started out as a brand that had two flavors, Quest Nutrition how has over 20 unique flavors and bars that are made for everyone. Vanilla Almond Crunch and Peanut Butter Supreme have been around since the creation of Quest, with new flavors added in the years following to expand their already delicious flavors!
feature_bullets: AMERICA VARIETY PACK. Indulge your taste buds with a variety of flavors guaranteed to give your eating habits an upgrade! This pack includes 3 of each flavor: Blueberry Muffin, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Oatmeal Chocolate Chip and Rocky Road.

CHEAT CLEAN. Eat toward your goals and love every bite along the way! With 20-21 grams of protein and plenty of fiber, these delicious protein bars are gluten free, have no added sugar, and are free of unnecessary carbs.

BEST-IN-CLASS PROTEIN BARS. We only use complete, dairy-based proteins and create our own chocolate flavored chips, cookie pieces, and other inclusions to make every bite as delicious as your cravings.

COMMITTED TO NUTRITION. Committed to developing and marketing innovative nutrition products that are both delicious and good for you, Quest Nutrition is driven to engineer foods that don’t compromise on taste or nutrition.

PROTEIN BAR OF THE YEAR. GNC’s 2012 and 2013 Protein Bar of the Year, Quest Nutrition pushes forward daily on their mission to transform global health and eliminate obesity for good. Welcome to the Quest!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
